name: InterviewHW
0:
”Alexa, Begin Interview Homework”
”Alexa, Ask Interview Homework about Amazon”
”Alexa, Ask Interview Homework to help me with ThoughtWorks interview”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: interview homework
des:
This skill can help to complete your task for collection companies information. It provides company brief introduction regarding what company does in the world or country. It also share details related to company origin, founder, headquarter and present CEO. This skill includes designed cards which includes interview process and company logo. All the listed companies can be heard with few interactions.
Presently, 15 companies are listed and you can invoke the company details by it's name or saying number from 1 - 15.
Listed companies are - Amazon, Microsoft, Thoughtworks, Deloitte, Wipro, Infosys, Capgemini, Cognizant, Yamaha, HSBC, Hero Motorcop, Tech Mahindra, Hilti, Mindtree, Reliance Jio.

Basic skill functions as Cancel, Stop or Repeat will work as well.

Note: If you face any issue or want to listen particular company, please write review on the skill and it will be added in next update of skill.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
